name: Ketto
description:
- ENGLISH -

Kettō is a quicktime duel based game with elements of action and adventure.

You are The Samurai, in a road to defend your town against The Ronin and his army of ninjas.

WASD/Cross Arrow to move .

Left Mouse/Space Bar to jump and attack.

- ESPAÑOL -

Kettō es un juego de duelos basado en  eventos de quicktime , con elementos de acción y aventura.

Tu eres El Samurai, en la misión de proteger tu poblado de El Ronin y su ejercito de ninjas.

WASD/Cross Arrow para moverte.

Left Mouse/Space Bar para saltar y atacar.

- Used Addons -

Models from Polygon Samurai Pack https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/polygon-samurai-pack-89551

Animations from Samurai Katana Animset https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/samurai-katana-animset-87700

Animations from Standard Assets https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/asset-packs/standard-assets-for...

Animations from Mixamo https://www.mixamo.com/#/

Some sounds from Freesound https://freesound.org/

 Main Theme: Shakuhachi [The Japanese Flute] - Kohachiro Miyata (Full)  

And some personal sounds, icons and scripts ;)

- Developer Coments -

This is a little project who shows the mechanic of duels, the theme of the Spain Game Devs Jam II for which it was created, it was made in one day sprint (20 hours) only for personal enjoying purposes.

Este es un pequeño proyecto que muestra la mecánica de los duelos, el tema de la Spain Game Devs Jam II para la que fue creado, se realizó en un sprint de un día (20 horas) solo para fines de disfrute personal.
